text: "Bicycle Race" is a 1978 song by Queen and was taken from their seventh studio album Jazz. It was released as an A-side to the single Fat Bottomed Girls. It went to number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 24 in the United States, number 10 in Ireland, number 20 in New Zealand, number 5 in the Netherlands, number 7 in Norway, number 21 in Austria and number 28 in Australia. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Rock songs
title: Bicycle Race
